definition: the gist (of a text or argument)/the main points
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: This is the message I would like us all to take forward into 2006.
sentences.chinese: 这是我希望我们大家带入2006年的要旨。

sentences.english: Their message is that a default by a sovereign European government is "unthinkable".
sentences.chinese: 他们的要旨是不允许任何欧洲主权国家违约。
这就是交流的要旨所在。

sentences.english: Firms need to comply not only with the rules but also the spirit of the code.
sentences.chinese: 各公司不仅需要遵守新政策，也应该遵守其精神要旨。

sentences.english: But the whole point is taking pictures.
sentences.chinese: 但全部的要旨都在于拍照。

sentences.english: The substance of their talk is condensed into a paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈话的要旨被压缩成一段话。

sentences.english: The aim of this paper is to sort out these records regarding Tomás Pereira .
sentences.chinese: 本文的要旨即在于梳理这部分有关徐日升的中文文献。

definition: the key trick/the secret of success
same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)

16-character formula, esp. Mao Zedong's mantra on guerrilla warfare: 敵進我退，敵駐我擾，敵疲我打，敵退我追|敌进我退，敌驻我扰，敌疲我打，敌退我追[di2 jin4 wo3 tui4 , di2 zhu4 wo3 rao3 , di2 pi2 wo3 da3 , di2 tui4 wo3 zhui1] when the enemy advances we retreat; when the enemy makes camp we harass; when the enemy is exhausted we fight; and when the enemy retreats we pursue
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
